install.name: Search - Content ( By: YOpenSource.com )
install.author: YOS Team
install.description:
Joomla 1.5 Native Plugin --- To Improve Original Search Component Of Joomla!.
If you like the plugin please vote for the plugin at --- http://extensions.joomla.org ---
You are invited to visit our website at --- YOpenSource.com ---
We just started so we need as much help from the users and the community as possible.
THANK YOU! for using the plugin. We hope you like it! Your feedback would be greatly appreciated.

param.name: search_limit
param.label: Search Limit
param.description: Number of Search items to return

param.name: point_occurrence_in_title
param.label: Point added if keyword found in title
param.description: This article 'll be added 10 point to score to decide the ordering if a keyword found in the article.

param.name: point_occurrence_in_fulltext
param.label: Point added if keyword found in fulltext
param.description: This article 'll be added 1 point to score to decide the ordering if a keyword found in the article.
